name: My Pal Munch Man
description:
Use LMB to make a waypoint for your new pal "Munch Man" to walk to. Set new waypoints on each wandering Sidewalk AI to eat them and increase your score. Have fun!

NOTE: Please excuse the glaringly obvious bugs - this game/demo was rushed together and still needs alot of polish and work. Please let me know what you think about the game tho!  :)
